po mngon 'dod pas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// bkur sti byos la skyabs su deng // 'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis// 'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags// gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la// bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad// chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen//

sangs rgyas bstan pa chos kyi ni// bdag nyid chen por mchog gyur la// thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten// ke na'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ ka shi'i tshong rdal du byon to// ka shi'i

tshong rdal de na sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha spad gnyis shig yod pa las/ bus smras pa/ pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge

'dun sku mnyel gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/ de la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/ 'on te dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ des smras pa/ khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/

nga ni thug pa sta gon byed do// des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so// de yang me long zhig thogs nas tshong dus su song ba las/ des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di lta bu'i

mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa yod do// gal te mnga' na bregs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa dang khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bregs lags sam/ khyim bdag bregs zin to// de mgu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa

bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don to// des smras pa/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs kyis nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa nas thug lta khyod ci rung bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'bul gyis bzhud la

spyan drongs shig/ nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo // de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/

dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bos na kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la mgron du bos la

kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes pa gang byung ba de ni dge slong dag rigs dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi bya/ rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi

bya'o// srel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sngon sman pa yin na gtsa' khab kyi snod srel ba dang / sngon yi ge pa yin na ram phyis srel ba dang / bzo mkhan rab tu byung na khab ral srel ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas sdig can

na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so// sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/ bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas sdig can na

srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so// zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so// zhes thos

kyis/ gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas ye khrims zhig bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya

zhing bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o// bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs kyis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pa gcad do// de nas sdig can gyi gyad thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya

ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang

bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs te song ngo // gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan ci khyod

dad par gyur tam/ des smras pa/ bdag dad par ni ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig//

btsun pa de lta lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la

mngon par ma dad/ chos la ma lags/ dge 'dun lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi

gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas gyad sna chen po la

gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing

mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan nga sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to// bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do// 'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na de bzhin du ngas

khyod la gnang ngo // de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te chas nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag

re zhig sdod cig bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag

gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas kho bo cag mi nyan to// des smras pa/ ji ste mi btub na bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo// de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo // dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shes

ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa zhig las/ 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo // de nas des g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas

'grangs par 'gyur ba de lta bur sta gon gyis shig/ des dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa re res re re 'grangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byas so// de nas sdig can gyi

gyad rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge

slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma spyad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bslus

lags kyis bzhes shig/ de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang de kho nas dge slong rnams 'grangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to// nyi ma gzhan zhig

la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon 'di dag snoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci kho bo la

sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na bdag gir mi bya'o// 'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyod nyid lags so zhes smra na blang

bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de bzhin du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// khyim bdag cig

gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang la spyan drangs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pas ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa/ des

bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung ngu byin pa dang gang gis mang du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur

ro zhes gsungs kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang / de dug gi shugs kyis brgya la nas sa la 'gyel te dbu bar

skyug cing bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o// de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon

med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na nye du rnams kyis 'di la dpyad byas pa zhig ces bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dris la dpyad byos shig/ dge slong

dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma

shes nas/ de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa kho na nyid yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang / gcin dang / thal ba dang sa'o// de la lci ba ni byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o// gcin yang de dag kho na'o// thal ba ni shing lnga po kan tsa na'i dang / ka pi d+ha ka'i dang / a shwat+tha'i dang / u dum bA ra'i dang /

n+ya gro d+ha'i'o// sa ni sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o// 'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no// de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pas ril zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slong sa ri la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams

gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol mnyan te bgyi'o// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal

lo/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta/ b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mAr tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nar tha pra sha ma ni/ sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni/ mA na

si/ mA na si/ ma hA mA na si/ a ts+yu te/ ad b+hu te/ ad d+yan b+hu te/ mug te/ mo tsa ni/ mok+Sha ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+me/ bra h+mA swa re/ sU ra Ni/ sU ra Na ma nor the/ mug te/ dzI ban te/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad las

srungs shig swA hA/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom

skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang / gces spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so// dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das

pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang gces spras byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par

rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo bde legs su gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so// de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/ 'dod pa rnams la zhe na/ 'chums/ brgyal

myos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med pas nags kyi rma bya chen mo rab tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las ji tsam na ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de

der yun ring du phyir rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya'i rnyis bzung ste/ de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di kho na yid la byas so// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/

bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mAr tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nar tha pra sha ma Ni/ sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni/ mA na si mA na si/ ma hA mA na si/ a ts+yu te/ ad b+hu te/ ad d+yan b+hu te/ mug te

mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha Ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ a mar Ni/ bra h+me/ brah+mA swa re/ sU ra Ne/ sU ra Na ma no ra the/ mug te/ dzI ban ti/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ des rma bya'i rnyi chad nas bros so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma

bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so// da ltar na yang nga'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyis

dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su byas par gyur pa la gzigs/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin nas

de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slong sa ri yin no// sman gyi gzhi rdzogs

so// // gos kyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni// 'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang // de bzhin kha tshar ring po dang // dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang // shi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang // tha ma dag ni nad pa yin// bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang //

dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang // g.yan pa bde gshegs mon dar dang // bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras// sdom la/ dum bu sa skyong seng ge dang / de bzhin yangs par song ba dang // sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang // a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang // tshong dpon chung ma

rigs skyes dang // sman pa yi ni lung dang ni// rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang // u dum bA ra gzhal ba dang // bskyed dang rgyal rigs skyed mos tshal// bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sbrul// ya mu na dang dur khrod dang // yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med// rgyal po'i khab

bdun bzhi lnga dang // 'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin// lus 'phags na rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa

las blon po'i mchog dum bus chos dang mthun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do// des na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor bltas shing 'dug go// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'

bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de yang

rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni seng ge zhes bya bar btags so// sa skyong dang seng ge rim gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang blon po'i mchog tu dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol

gnon pa gnas lnga la byang ba yin te/ des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe/ lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go// de nas blon po de rnams zil gyis non pas mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal

po'i drung du dong ngo // de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod rgyal po lha nga yin mod/ gzhan su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyis

lha ma lags so// gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas des na dbyen byed do snyam mo// re zhig dus gzhan

zhig na rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug pa dang / blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go// gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir

byung ba de'i tshe yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gang gi slad du snyan du gsol pa spyan sngar bab lags mod/ gal

te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams khwa ltar khum 'phrig za ba yin pas des bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o snyam nas de de la

klan ka tshol bar gyur to// 'jig rten na mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gis thabs legs par soms shig/ de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa gang du 'gro/

gal te mnyan yod du song na ni mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas nyen 'di nyid yod do// de bzhin du bA rA Na sI dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di nyid yod do// yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang

yin pa de la ni nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas ye yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas des yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la bdag ni khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes pho nya btang ngo // de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spring ba/ yangs pa can 'dir

byon pa legs kyis spyon cig/ de nas blon po'i mchog dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni yangs pa can du chas kyis khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni 'dug shig/ gang dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo //

ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gis ba lang dang ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba yangs pa can du 'dong gis go gyon cig/ de nas skye bo'i tshogs de ltar sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste

rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/ skyed mos tshal du mchi na gzigs su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin byas song shig/ des skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/ steng bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs

nas song ngo // blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so zhes thos nas/ de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha dum bu ni bros so// rgyal pos smras pa/ deng la slar khug shig/ de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas bsnyags

te smras pa/ dum bu lhas bka' stsal gyis slar log shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'o dum bu shi'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshegs chung dus grub kyis deng shig/ kho bo ni bros pa yin no// de rnams kyis

rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas log ste rgyal po la smras pa/ lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so// rgyal pos ma legs so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tshe yangs

pa can na ris gsum du gnas te/ ris dang po na ni khang pa rtseg ma bdun stong ba gam gser las byas pa'o// ris bar ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas pa'o// ris tha ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa ste/ de

rnams na mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnas so// yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no// bar ma'i gang

yin pa de ni ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do// tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtong bar byed do// bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin to// bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs

spyad pa kho nar byed do// dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te ris dang por khang pa byin nas/ de na gnas par brtsams pa las gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/

des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o// yangs pa can pa rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu 'dus shig/ 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung des 'du bar brtsams nas blo gros ma byin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu blo gros byin

cig/ des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na blo gros ni mi sbyin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin no// sngon yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bi+A

rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na rtsub po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do// gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do// gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/

shes ldan dag gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ de 'jam po dang bcas par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/

de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do// dum bus sa skyong dang seng ge khyim phub nas seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos

can zhes bya bar btags so// de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par

byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar btags so// de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha

bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis de dag gi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams

kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ lits+tsha bI 'di dag rnams gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gis 'di slar zlog cig/ des de bkug nas smras pa/ bu yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha

bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis 'di dag gi skyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya zhig/ de dag gis gnod par byas sa re/ des smras pa/ yab 'di dag la ni skyed mos tshal mchis na bdag cag la ni ma mchis so// des smras pa/ bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la

gsol ba gdab bo// des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis bdag la skyed mos tshal zhig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams kyis de dag la skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na

shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go// cig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so// de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na sa skyong dang seng ge'i shing sA

la'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas lits+tsha bI rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu song la der

rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug shig/ de der song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed par brtsams so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las

des kyang dus thung ngu zhig tu chos dang mthun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o// yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhag go// kha cig

gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa rtsal po che zhig ste/ gal te de sde dpon du bcug na gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni des pa 'grogs na bde ba tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na de sde

dpon du gzhug go// thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des smras pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyis rim

pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go// des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na de ni ma 'os pas ye bkur ro snyam nas des khas

blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go// yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed pa las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe seng ge la sogs pa tshogs

kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or ba gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste bklags nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi

tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ ci kho bo'i pha shi'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa shi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug

bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ci ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can pa rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyis rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des

rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btang ngo // des de la spring pa 'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ngo // de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go// ji tsam

dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam

pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug/ lha thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ cig shos la

ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o// de nas sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas

khyod kyi nye gos can tshur bkri zhig dang btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro// des de la yi ge lan spring ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad de/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so// ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa yangs

pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtong ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang khyod kyis khrid de song shig/ de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song

ba las rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srung zhig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la mgul pa la dril dpyangs

shig dang gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa'am/ 'bros par gyur pa de srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu

dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go// sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/ kho bo skyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung shig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal

po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs la skyed mos tshal du byung shig/ des rgyan rnams thogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan thogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo // su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po

la'o// des smras pa/ kho mo phu mo yin na khyod ci ste bag mar gtang / gal te de lta na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so// seng ge sngangs pas

nye gos can yin no snyam nas gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang sngangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyags nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang

ba yin pas des lits+tsha bI lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun zin gyis lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar deng shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do// go phud cig

de rnams kyis go phud pa dang lnga brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas skrag ste bros so// yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu

rnams lan glon du gzhug gis glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go// sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu

gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so// khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'ongs sam 'ongs pa legs so//

lha bdag mchis lags so// nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so// ci zhig zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas gos can khrid de mchis so// bltas khrid de shog shig/ de nang du khrid pa dang rgyal

pos lhag par gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na de btsas ma thag

tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// re zhig dus gzhan

zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// ji tsam na mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to// de

nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya bar skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di su la g.yar mchi

rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so// gal te de lta na ngas drang srong 'di yongs su spangs so// de gsad par brtsams te de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po

'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par bkris/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin pas gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs

na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so// de smon lam log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la

khrag gi char bab bo// gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i

rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so// rgyal po sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar stsang shas bltams par bgyis te

gsol la nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/

kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtswa gtar nas khrag blud pas de 'dod pa de dang bral bar gyur to// ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig

btsas so// btsas te gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab bo// rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas rmas pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na gdon mi 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang phral nas rang nyid cod

pan bcings te rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo de'i tshe yangs pa can na lits+tsha bI ming chen zhes bya ba

zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod pa las der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo // de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan rnams bkug

nas dris pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de srung du gsol cig dang dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ skyed mos tshal der kun nas srung ma'i mi

rnams bkod nas nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil

mas bkram/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas skyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chu shing gi sdong po gas

nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa

yin pas 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o// ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung pa rnams dang / shAkya

rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa gang kho na la ma byin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims

su bcas pas re zhig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun bsnyod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud dang 'tsham par

'ga' zhig la chung mar byin na tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni mi gtang ste tshogs kyis spyad do// zhes bcas pa yin gyis re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig bltas khrid de shog shig/ des de tshogs

kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de kun tu brtags par brtsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis su la yang mi sbyin no// de nas khyim bdag

ming chen yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes tshogs kyis spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs

so// yab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu mo sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste gal te bdag la tshogs

kyi dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/ bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa stsal ba dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe bdag

gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o// ming chen gyis a mra skyong ma'i spring ba bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas te/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang

pa ni bud med rin po che 'di kho na la 'os so// gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smra ba de yang bden te sha kho na rnams las ni 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha kho na tha chad yin pas gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos kyang nang du zhugs na

gdon ma zos par gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro// nang du 'jug pa des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya thogs te nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du dgos so// zhag bdun lon pa na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang

bden te/ sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma yin pas gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na su zhig de'i khyim du

'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to// yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral

bar gyur to// kha cig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so// des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag

gang na rgyal po'am blon po'am phyug po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags

te dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di gang zhig 'di ni rgyal po rab snang ngo // gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo// gzhan 'di gang zhig bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o// des de

bzhin du dris pa dang de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so// de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des bsams pa/ skyes bu 'di ltar chu zheng gab pas ni bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus so snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig

na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang gzhir song nas blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa skyong gis smras pa/ lha re zhig gzhan lta zhog/ yangs pa

can na smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so// des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do// des smras

pa/ yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa slar rgol ba dgra bo lags pas khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'dong ngo // des smras pa/ lha gal te don ma mchis

pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas sa skyong ni skyed mos tshal na sdod do// rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs

pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams rod rod por gyur nas shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos a mra skyong ma la dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum pa nyul bar bgyid do//

ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i slad du'o// ji ltar bya/ ci 'bros sam/ lha mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas re zhig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la dgung bdun lags dang dus mkhyen par bgyi'o//

de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so// des de la seng ras shig dang sor gdub

rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no// 'on te khye'u yin na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgya mgul tu thogs te nga'i drung du bkri shig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang dril bu 'khrol bar 'dug go// de rnams kyis smras pa/

shes ldan dag dgra bo byung gis rjes bzhin du btsal lo zhes lits+tsha bI skyin gor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang sa skyong gis mthong nas des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams mchi na/ lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi'am/

'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni dub pas shing rta ded kyis khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khyes shig/ des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di

yin gyis slar ldog go// de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te 'dus nas yang khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go zhes bcas so// ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang a mra skyong ma la khye'u

gzugs bzang la mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas zhes bya ba nas bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de yangs pa can pa'i lits+tsha bI'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ bran mo'i

bu khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na pha su yin/ de ngus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang des smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir du ngu / des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu gal te yang 'dri ba dang nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do zhes smros shig/ gal te

su yin zhes smra dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smros shig/ ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do// su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying

po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang brdegs so// des ngus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te

'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo// de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la deng shig dang sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro// khye'u 'di yang

rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog cig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// bu la yang mu tig gi do shal cig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang mu tig gi do shal rkang

pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug shig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smra dang de la yang bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus

byas te sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug go// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go// des

smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu smras pas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug

bcu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba

zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba nas dga' mgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/

de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo // de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro// de nas rgyal

pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog/ des smras pa/ lha g.yar tsha lags kyis khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ de yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas des

rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras khra bo byin nas smras pa/ gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du bkri shig/ 'on te bu mo yin

na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo // ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/ kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo // spring ba des thos

nas bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du phongs par gyur nas/ des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring ba/ bag ma tsha bar 'dug shig ci nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar

ngas bya'o// rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/ ded dpon nga la rin po che che ge mo dang che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo // de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta

na sdug pa zhig btsas so// ma bslabs kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis bkris nas sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te

rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang gzhir song nas rgyal po gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/

des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo // de nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba'o ni ci yin ltos shig/ de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lha sgrom bu zhig mchis so// des smras pa/ long shig/ rgyal bu

gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis smras pa/ lha sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar ci gnang / rgyal pos de bzhin bya'o zhes khas blangs so// ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kha phye shig/ kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo // rgyal

pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bsnun bsnyod bskyed de rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig

tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsol zhes bya bar grags so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to// de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med

gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis bdag cag gis bzo cung zad bslabs te/ des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po

gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu 'jigs med gzhon nus mthong nas/ des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags so// 'dis ci 'thob/ 'tsho ba'o// des bsams

pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas shing rta mkhan bslab bo snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab bo// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags

so/ bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig/ des bslab par brtsams so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig

yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so// 'di ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do// ci thob/ gal te nad pa zhig sos na rngan pa thob bo// 'on te gum na mi 'tshol mi 'dri'o// des bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo snyam nas/ de pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lha gnang bar

mdzod cig/ sman dpyad bslab lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no// khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na slobs shig/ des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad

ni lobs na des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/ des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir de na

sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob tu mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis mtsho'am/ lha yang na ni dpyad mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o// bu gal te de lta na song shig/ des rgyal po pad ma'i

snying po la spring ba/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang / pad ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du

ched du 'ongs kyis 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas pa lobs so// rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig khrid de 'gro ba

yin pas de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag ni byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo // 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa

ni legs pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bya'o snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo // kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma sbyin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces zer ro// des de bzhin du byas pas sos

par gyur to// ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji lta sos par gyur to// sang yang de nyid byin cig/ ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bstan tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de

dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'di ni 'tsho byed la phrin du spring ba yin no// des bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig/ rgyun

shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas de gang du 'gro bar der 'tsho byed 'khrid do// bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag la ni mi mdzad do// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed

ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge

mo zhig gi rin dris shig/ khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo // 'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o// bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin

byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam mo// de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan

pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to// gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa/ ma 'tshal lags so// 'tsho byed la dris pa dang des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/

bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so// ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no// gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la deng

la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog shig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de de dag gis blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig

blangs so// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro/ des smras pa/ des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las

des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to// de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud 'di khyod snoms shig/ des phrum tshud blangs te/ zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po

che'i rjes zhig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i rjes so// 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba de ring kho nar glang po che'i phrug

gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/

bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni che ge mo zhig gis nad che ge mo zhig yin la de bzhin du gzhan yang gzhan dag kyang yin no// 'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad sman lags te/ sman ma

lags pa ni ci yang ma mchis so// 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchis so// 'di dag ci dgos sdig pas zin pa las 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go// phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o// rdo'i

dum bus ni ston ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chag par 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyi bus 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/ bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus

su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po che phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid

du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tsho byed bden nam/ mkhan po mad do// de glang po che'i rjes sam/ bal glang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na ci ste ma 'tshal/

glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo// bal glang mo'i rjes ni chur ring ngo // mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa las so// sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba las so// deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin

be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang po che'i phrug gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchi bas so// de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcis pa las so// de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji

ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog thu zhing mchi bas so// de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ljan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so// de lta lags kyis kyang

gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 'gron pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i

khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ 'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can no// 'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslabs so// ji tsam na mi zhig klad nad kyis thebs nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bu bdag la dpyad

mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang sang bdag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i

phyir yin na/ bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dben par zhog zhig dang / khyed kyi las ji ltar byed pa blta'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go// de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du

bcug ste thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas de skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po gzu lums su ma blangs shig/ rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid 'gum par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan

po bdag mchis so// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzod de rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang de nas 'or cig/ des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur

gyis khyod khrus byos la shog shig dang klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad sbyin no// des khrus byas nas/ 'ongs pa dang des de la klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig/ mkhan po de

bzhin bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas rgyal po pad ma'i snying po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyis mchi'o// de'i tshe rgyal po pad ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des

smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas re zhig de phob la phyis song shig dang / de lta na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro// des de la khas blangs pa dang de

nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las des mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng de rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dpya blangs te slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas de nyid la rjes su yi rangs

nas des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la byin no// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas de nyid du dbyar gnas te/ de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer

du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer

nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to// de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo // rin ji tsam/ kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya'o// des de nyos nas de nas bltas na 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa zhes bya

ba'i nor bu mthong nas de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe mar mes khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo // de rim gyis yul u dum bA rar phyin pa dang / de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bos gzhal nas bre mgo

la snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o// tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du gzhag pa dang /

ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo // de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des khas blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du

'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang sang dpyad bya'o// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo // 'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyin 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad kyis

klad pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tsha bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg pa byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// des de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka

zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag cig la skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin rnams su skyes so// de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas des skyed

mos tshal der srung ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa bzhag pa dang / de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos tshal de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig skyed mos tshal der song nas nub

mo 'brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo 'brang btab ste 'dug go// ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di

bdag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir 'di bsdigs/ khyod la ra spu'i dud pas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang smras pa/ khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang

med pa lta/ des ni khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro// thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/ khyim

bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis ra spu'i dud pas bdugs pa dang mi ma yin pa de dpag

tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to// khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa/ nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug/ des

de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thung shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/ mi des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la

bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal so zhing 'dug go// ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnams 'khrugs nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol tu phyung ngo // shing de la yang bya rgod mo phrug gu

dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las de la phrug gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma sha byin cig/ des smras pa/ bu sha ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te shi nas phyung ba yin no// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs nas des 'di sos par byed

pa'i gnas de yod do// ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas reg par byas na'o// de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so// de nas de langs te ro'i drung du song nas dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis gyad

brdabs pas shi ba yin no// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog zhig dang blta'o// de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas des smyug

ma'i sbubs su phye ma blugs te khas bus pa dang phye mas nang grol rnams la reg nas sos par gyur to// des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang de rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho phun

sum tshogs pa yin pas de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur te/ de gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do// de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do// des sman pa 'tsho

byed der 'ongs so zhes thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag la bro nad mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa lta na dpyad

bya'o// des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lags so// des smras pa/ khyod kyis dpyad gzhan ni med do// bdag las phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so// de nas des sgren mor phyung ste bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas

srin bu de de la chags pa dang des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur to/ de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do// des

kyang de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis chu bo ya mu na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i bting ba'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i breng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa

dang 'dzums pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang long mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas/ de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig thal mos bsnun pas

mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ des rting ba'i rgyus pa'i breng nas drangs pa dang slar tshud par gyur to// des de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi

med zhugs te/ der de las phrug gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nyen par gyur nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos las bya'o snyam nas/ des mi

de la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje song la lo ma'i spyil bo byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang dron por gyis shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de sa la bsnyal nas sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang srin

gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo // de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu cig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phrug gu rnams khrid de byung nas phrug gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i

dum bu bor ba dang mi de sos par gyur to// des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi phu

bo 'ongs kyis bsur song shig/ de bsur song ba dang 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bsur 'ong ba thos nas des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis des bsu ba rang gir byas pa ni nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de slar log ste

sgo gzhan zhig nas zhugs so// dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te sems g.yeng zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste bdag la sman ston cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob cig/

de drang po zhig pas thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to// mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba de bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje gang du 'gro// des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang des smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/ des

kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas des thal bas btab pa dang long bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor phol mig byung ngo // des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag sman pa rnams khug shig/ blon po

rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gis dpyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na bdag cag gis bgyi ba ci 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho

byed khug shig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis skyu ru ras

bskus shing smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na ma tshor bar spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol to// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste 'tsho bar 'gyur

ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rma de sos shing pags pa dang 'dra ba dang skra yang mnyam par gyur to// rgyal pos khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha re zhig bshos gsol cig/ rgyal pos

zan zos nas 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig lha bgyis lags so// de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so// me long blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // btsun mo la dris na des kyang phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so//

rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig/ mi long ba des smras pa/ lha ci sras la byams pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/

sman mkhas pas so// des smras pa/ gal te de lta lags na 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos par lta ga la byas/ des smras pa/ de ni mad na 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des

bdag la bstan to// ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyis/ da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang smras pa/ lha 'di

sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che la bskyon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to// rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran nad kyis thebs nas/ sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang / des bsams pa/

'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o// gal te dpyad cig byas na ni de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas 'tsho byed bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka'o// des

bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na 'di la ci byar yod/ dus la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo // de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang srog chags go d+hA tsan dan zhes bya ba 'thabs te lhung ba dang de bkres pas

nyen pas de gnyis ka zos te/ lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag lhas yod pa der song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas skran rdol te yar slon mar 'khrus nas sngon ji lta ba bzhin du

gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags mo'i mdoms kyi phyogs su phol mig byung ngo // des rgyal po la smras pa dang rgyal pos 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dpyad byos shig/ des khas blangs so// de nas zan byas te ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du

'dug tu chug cig/ des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snyam mo// de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/ smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du gtsags bu sbas te ma ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la
