zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags

pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do// dge slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs skabs su spyod

pa dang / brtags te spyod pa dang / cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding

ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o// gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos na de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i

dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo

khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mi pha bi ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi

gding ba dang / shur bu dang / rgya cang dang / lcug gu'i gding bas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to// da dung yang rgyab nag por gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba

nas nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring nga snga dro sham

thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las de na des dge 'dun gyi

gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding bas dge

'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o// longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ stug na ni rim gcig gis so// seng ba zhig na rim gnyis kyis so// dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha

tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po'am/ 'dam ka'am/ kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcang bar bya ste/

gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas dri mi zhim la sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed gzhogs

'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste g.yan pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o// gzhan

du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chag sa rnams dang / shing drung gi gnas rnams na dri mi zhim pa dang / sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas

gnas shing longs spyad par byed pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la

sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab khung dang / snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o// dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te

'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung

lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa mon dar gyi chos gos la chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang

rung ngo // // sdom la/ gso ma skra yi chos gos dang // gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos// mthang gos can dang g.yang gzhi dang // gso ras seng ras pa char sngo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o// bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag skra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar

gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags

yin no// gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o// byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams

par gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo zhes

yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te so so nas bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo// des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro// de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod

khyim thab tu bdams so zhes smras pa dang / des mjug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par brtsams pa de yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so// des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang

khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no zhes pa rma bya des thos nas yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang // 'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni// nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na// ci slad khyod kyi

sras mo bdag mi stsal// yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang // 'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni// nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur kyang // 'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus

kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid de/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // da ltar yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung

ngo // yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dreg par rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ skra 'bal ba 'di

ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun

pa bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang

gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o// 'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi

chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

btsun pa bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig

gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do// de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang

bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de bzhin du thams cad ser ba'am/ thams cad dmar ba'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// // sdom la/ kha tshar ring dang gdengs ka dang // ral ka gtsug

tor thod dang ni// ra bal gos dang rnga bal klam// mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i

chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ral ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong

zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar

gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du

'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin

no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu

gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te snam sbyar med par

de phyi rol du byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing snam sbyar med par gar du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o//

song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla gos su

bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang / char bab pa dang / char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas

dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o// // bar sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi// byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni// rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang // dge 'dun rnyed dang de de'i yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams

kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dag gi dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dang ba dang de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la

bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o// blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur

ro// bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan

po dang slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o// dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa na rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas/ dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// gzhan dag

gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs na ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag

cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang de

nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// cig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro// gal

te de lta na long shig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o// cig

shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya na su 'gro// gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams sus bsrung gang gzhon pas so// de ltar mi nus kyis gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams bsrung ngo // de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon

pa shos dge slong rnams bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo // drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo re mos re mos mi stong par byed pa yin pas nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na

nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skye ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas brtan byon pa legs so byon pa legs so// slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// des bsams pa/ 'di

ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri 'or che ge mo zhig nas so// ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag

khang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob dpon legs so// nye

bsams pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis

nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do// de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so// de nas

de nang par sngar langs te/ rgan zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i rgan zhugs cig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig smras nas de gnyis ngal sos pa

dang khong gsum char yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig/ gnas brtan bgo'o// nye rgan zhugs gcig la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ gnas brtan bdag ni mi 'gyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // cig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye smras pa/ khyed ni nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur

bar 'dod dam ci/ nye bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis bsdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan

bdag gis gtsug lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob pa na lta nye gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag dar bya'o//

'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa

de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin

pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lta nye 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthus

yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems

dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug lag khang

phyag dar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o// de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang

mi smra bar 'dug go// de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o// de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas smras pa gnas

brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go// de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsol bar bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed nyon cig/ khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/

'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so// cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur

gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des bgo bar brtsams nas de nas ras yug gcig kha khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo // de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras

pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan

'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du

'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag

da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyid nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing gang

gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// cig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o// de na gcig ni chur song ngo // cig shos

kyis ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bskrogs te skam la bton nas de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do// chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos

shig/ cig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do// ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas

zhes bya ba de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa tsha bo dag ci ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug/ zhang po bdag cag ni nya rnyed pas so// ci ste mi 'gyed/ zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so// khyod ni nyes pas 'jigs pa bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal

bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bsdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag

chur zhugs te/ bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bskrogs te skam la 'thon pa dang 'dis bsad do// tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu'i nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro ba de ni sdong dum gyis 'jigs pa dang / tsher mas 'jigs pa

dang / gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis bskrogs kyang ci phan/ mdor na 'dis nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya

ste 'khang bar mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do// tsha bo gal

te skam la song bas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba de ni dba' glong gis 'jigs pa dang / rus sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin ku ma bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod

do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bskrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas

kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do// de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci dgyes pa bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/

mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa// de ni chos la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/

'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// mgo yang med cing mjug med

pa'i// nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni// shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs// des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing // chos dang chos min mi shes pa'i// rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/

rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs// de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni

rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so//

khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsam na nye khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re

la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de las ras yug gcig ma grub na bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas ras rnams

'brim pa na/ nye ras yug gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis

bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de lta su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so// des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams

pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma

bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi

rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon

byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan po zhig yod

pa des thos nas de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs

te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song

ngo // bram ze des smad par brtsams so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma bos so// da lta na yang ngo // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag

cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do// gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs dben zhing

bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam

na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig

bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang / der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu'am phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/

rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// // sdom la/ bye ba rnams la skal ba ni// sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las// dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos kyi// rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/

chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/

gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o//

ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras

yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las ri 'or de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin no// dge slong

rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams

che ba shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa

brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun gyir brtags pa dang / dge slong gir brtags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor bstan pa'o//

mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la gnyug mar gnas

pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin no// gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni

mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go// kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go// lam chen po dang / tshong dus dang /

bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no// zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas

pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/

dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam

bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa nyid la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul

la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar

chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang

bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa

gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas

pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas

pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang

khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar

'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang

bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang

bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang

bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang

dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar

'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang

bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang

dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su khas dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa gang

dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa'am/ bud med

dam/ ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni

dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i'o// yang thog pa'i'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i'o zhes brtags pa ni de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de

kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang

zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltams pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te mchod rten

chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// // sdom la/ gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang // bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang // gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang // dbyung ba gsol dang

shi ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung

ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang

bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas

gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang

po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa cig shos so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa

gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams

la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres

nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo ba byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du

gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa

nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no//

dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams

'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed

na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma

bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos

pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na

dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na

bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs

nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o//

dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la

sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang

bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong

gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shin dam ma bcas pa

rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed

na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// // sdom ni/ nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlabs// bar ma sbyin dang blang bya dang //

bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang // spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nye dga'i spyi bor phol mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang sos par

'gyur ro// nye bsams pa/ gal te de ring kho na 'thungs na de ring nyid du sos par 'gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang bar ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan

cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kun tu mngags pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos phal mo che bslangs so// phyi de nyin par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod snyun gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin

ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis deng nyis 'gyur du gsol cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos lags so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes par gyur te/

mar dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos mang du dgos kyis slongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so// de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs pas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris

pa/ 'phags pa mar gsol tam/ bzhin ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des smras pa/ bzhin de ring ni sum 'gyur tu btung ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par

gyur kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so// des smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro// sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo // de nas nye mar khus lhung bzed bkang

ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'o// de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni chos gos las so// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so// cha gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis

thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te

sreg tu dong ngo // de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo// dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis dge slong nye dga'

la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba'am bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na ba la rim gro byas

sam zhes gyis shig gal te ma bgyis so zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas

gtogs 'dod thong shig ces smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/

btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi ste/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams

la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste bsgyur nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri

dge slong rnams kyis bgos so zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan

cig yang bgos so// yangs pa can pa dang / bA rA Na sI ba dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa

na lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gaN+DI dang / rgyud chags gsum

dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o// shi ba'i gaN+DI rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no//

dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol bar byas te bgos na mi 'khrug par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// shi

ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang mi gda' ba mchis pa

'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab bo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge

slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste gsol ba'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun

pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye ba 'khor thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo

byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol ba'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur

ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig

tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pas

de srog dang phral lo// ji tsam na ma stes te chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i

sha bcad la btso'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu blang ngo // de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci

yog pa zos la lhag ma dug gis gdab bo// de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma dug gis btab bo// gang dag chu la dong pa de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs

nas lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la/ gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas des ro de dag thams

cad mthong ngo // de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog mas

rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste// lhag par bsags par mi bya'o// sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba// gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i

dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de

dge slong gis rim gro byas na 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to// de nas gos 'ged pas rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig/ des smras pa/ yo byad ni khyod 'ged na kho bo 'khru'am/ khyod nyid kyis khrus shig/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o// gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o// dge slong shes nyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo

byad dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes des bdams shing bdams shing bzang po rnams blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams

las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma rnams las sbyin par bya'o// nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong

nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas dge slong zhig la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na dge

slong de shi'o// de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyis phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de gson pa'i tshe nyid na ma byin na shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs

pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas des lus kyi gnas la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyis bdag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig/ des khas blangs pa las de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so//

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / dge slong dag dge slong de log par ltung ngo // gal te tshangs pa mtshungs

par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod par byas par gyur dang dad pa skyes pas log par lhung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba yal bar mi bzhag ste/ nad g.yog sbyin par bya'o// des de la

dris te/ gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no// ji ste de yang ma grub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/

rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o// sos par gyur na de la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de

bsab par bya'o// gal te med na de ni spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba tshor bas nyen pa zhig

yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so//

dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so// gos 'ged pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'

bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed gzhag pa'i snod ma dbye zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phye ba dang sbrul

zhig mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras bslang nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di spongs la song shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro// de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod lam

gyis song ste nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des der khros pa'i me sbar bas nags de rab tu 'bar te de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag srid pa thams cad la skrag par gyis shig/ srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de gnas gsum po nags stug por bros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i dang / dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thams

cad las yid byung bar bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing gang la skye ba de yongs su spang bar bya'o// ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar

sbyin par bya'o// ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gos 'ged pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug

par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de sngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong zhig shi nas dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste/ dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug

lag khang du lhags te/ gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i rol mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged

par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i rol mchod pa byas la de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro//

gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te ro la mchod pa byas bsregs nas de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las des dbyug pa blangs

te langs nas re zhig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa

dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// // sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang // dngos po'i skyin pa lag gi bla// mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang // pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim bdag

cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lhags so// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te lnga po gang gis zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs

par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku

skal bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang / spyil bo nas spyil bo dang / 'chag sa nas 'chag sa

rnams su 'chag cing gshegs pa na gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang / de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba shes pa chung ba rang gi gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so//

bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so// zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung na ci'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar

gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes ngu skad 'don/ btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa'am lta ba ma mchis so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa ma

mchis lags so// de bas na khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad

do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros

pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no// gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la lha rnams ni gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug cig/ ngas ni 'di'i rim gro bya'o// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas dge slong de bzung ste gcin dang ngan skyugs nas phyung nas

mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ smyug gi tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te bkrus so// de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug ste/ de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/ phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do// de nas phyag dang zhabs

bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi

spyan sngar song ngo // chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms nod nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong ci ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par

tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas

bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che ba

zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/ bsod snyoms phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das

kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu drug pa/ de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro

mdzad de/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas le los dus 'das par byed pa ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des nam gyi cha

stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon

mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs

dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba

dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ pha med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do// de lta bas na tshangs

pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o// lhan cig gnas pas ni mkhan po'i'o// slob dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon gyi'o// mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig

pa'i'o// slob dpon gcig pas ni slob dpon gcig pa'i'o// gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i'o// phebs par smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o// smos 'drin gyis ni smos 'drin gyi'o// 'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun

gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ mang po sbyin te mthar na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas des

mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// des slob ma'i

rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim

gro byas so// da ltar yang byas so// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma

zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par byed pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal

srid byed du 'jug ste/ de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/ nad pa rnams la ni khyad par du byed do// ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams

la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dpyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas

thug bgyis te zla ba drug tu stsal na de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan gyis ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa ni bden no// de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par dka' bar gyur nas des ma

ma la dri bar brtsams pa/ ma ma nga dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon lan 'ga' yang khros pa yod dam gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi pang du byon pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la yang lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras

pa/ yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' la khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang su la yang khro ma myong na khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/ des bsams pa/ sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas des sman pa

rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag ngas rang la brtags na nga sngon su la yang khro ma myong bas nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtor cig/ lha bdag cag ni mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas

de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/ khrag des zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug blud pas sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa

rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi bi'i bu gzhogs phyed skams par gyur nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu'i dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol

cig/ lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad bsogs na 'di'i yang shang shang te'u'i sham rnyed do// sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag me long dang bya gag khyer te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du deng la der rnyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long

zhog cig dang / bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no snyam ste/ skad phyung ba dang / shang shang te'u yis bya gag gi skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de bzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yin no// de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas

pa las ji tsam na las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo // 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chags shang shang te'u yis smras pa/ bdag

gar bkri/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ thong shig/ thong shig/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang rin po che rnams smra'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ re zhig khyod kyis sman de dag ci 'dra ba bltas ston cig/ des smras pa/

bdag gi khrus byas pa'i chu ni sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyis de khyer la dengs shig rin po che 'di dag yin no// de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang te'u de nyid khyer te dong ba las rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de rnams kyis srog

chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang smras so// de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la dris pa dang smras pa/ lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so// rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar

bzhag go// ji tsam na de de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pas de srid du khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ re zhig thog ma bdag blun te//

phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go// de nas rgyal po blun pa ste// blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs// zhes smras nas song ngo // de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag shang shang te'u'i khrus byas pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa bden nam/ de

rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mad lags kyis mar dang sgrol cig/ de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so// ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas pa las de na gcig gzhogs phyed skams par gyur te/ de la rang

sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la sman pa la smos te sman sten cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba

sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi chos 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na ci'i phyir grong khyer gyi mthar 'gro de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan

pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs so// ji tsam du bsod nams mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du

phyin to// de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud

thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyis bzhud la slongs shig dang / gal te skal ba'i khyad par can gyis bcud de thob na des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sgo kar bsdad de/ rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sbron du gzhug pa'i

phyir sgor rgyun du dril 'dogs te/ gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do// ci tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril te dkrol to// de nas rgyal po'i bus pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum slong ba po zhig mchis kyis ci zhig slong smros

shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsogs te btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thung shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba smra'o// de ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas
