khang steng gi bsil khang yang lnga rtseg tu bya'o// de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam

ba las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas

khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u ming cir gdags/ nye du dag gis smras pa/ khye'u 'di khyim bdag sbyin pa'i bu yin pas/ de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ni bzang sbyin du gdags

so zhes de'i ming ni bzang sbyin zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u bzang sbyin ma ma brgyad po pang na thogs pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs byed pa'i ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o

ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas ma ma'i pang na

'dug ste phyir byung ba dang / slong bas rgyan bslangs pa/ gzhon nu bdag la rgyan dgos kyis bdag la rgyan byin cig/ de dga' ba dang mgu bas de la rgyan byin no// de khyim du zhugs pa dang de'i phas ma ma la dris pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan ga re/ des smras pa/ gzhon nus slong ba po la stsal

to// de rgyan gzhan dag gis brgyan na de yang byin no// de yang brgyan na de yang des byin nas khyim bdag des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo bdag cag gi bu ni bzang po zhig btsas te rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te de lta na

slan chad rgyan de lta bu ni mi bgyid do// des smras pa/ bzang mo bdag cag la gser dang rin po che tshad med pa yod mod kyi/ rgyan brdung ba med pas 'di mdor na phyi rol du gtang bar mi bya'o zhes de nang kho na na rtsen du 'jug go// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag sbyin pa gla mi'i skye bos yongs

su bskor nas 'bab chu a dzir ba til khrus byed du chas pa dang khye'u bzang byin gyis smras pa/ yab bdag kyang mchi'o// des de la brid par brtsams te bu 'di nyid na chu bzang po yod do// 'bab chu ni chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yin pas khyod 'dir ma mas khrus byos shig/ des

dus so// de'i mas smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u 'di ci'i slad du du/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod kyis lhag par bsrungs par gyur na lhan cig bzhud pa la nongs pa ci mchis/ des de khrid de 'bab chu'i ngogs su song nas khrus byas te chu 'gram

du bzhag go// des smras pa/ yab ci'i slad du bdag bsrung bar mdzad/ bu khyod la nyes pa yod do// yab bdag la nongs pa ci 'dra ba zhig mchis/ rgyan byin zhing byin pa dag slong ba rnams la byin pas so// yab ci nor don du gnyer ba lags sam/ bu su zhig don du mi gnyer/ yab gal te

de lta na bdag cag chab tu 'jug tu stsol cig/ des de chur bcug pa dang / de nas de'i lag pa gnyis chu nang du bcug nas/ lcags kyi bum pa gser gyis gang ba zhig phyung nas smras pa/ yab 'di las khyod ji tsam bzhed pa'i nor gyis nor gyi bya ba mdzod la lhag ma 'di nyid du chug cig/ bu khyod kyis

ci chu nang na yod pa'i gter mthong ngam/ yab chu na mchis pa 'ba' zhig tu ma bas kyi/ thang la mchis pa dang / bdag po mchis pa dang / bdag po ma mchis pa dang / gang dag ring po na mchis pa dang / gang dag nye ba ma mchis pa yang mthong ngo // khyim bdag sbyin pa ngo mtshar

skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bsams pa/ nor gyi bdag po 'di lta bus ni sbyin pa btang bar nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na ci dga' bar sbyin pa byin cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji tsam pha gson pa de'i bar du bu'i grags pa mi 'byung ba yin no// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag

sbyin pa shi nas bzang sbyin khyim gyi rje bor gyur nas/ de rtag tu mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin pas kun du khyim bdag sbyin pa'i bu bzang sbyin khyim gyi rje bor gyur te/ de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin no zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes

bya bar grags so// de nas des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas khye'u bdun btsas

so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ des drug la khyim phub bo// bdun pa legs skyes zhes bya ba de'i chung ma rigs mnyam pa las chung ma btsal na ma rnyed nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go// de'i ne'u zla bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung po zhes bya ba des de de ltar sems khong du chud pa

mthong nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug/ des smras pa/ bdag gis bu drug ni khyim phubs na bdun pa legs skyes kyi chung ma rigs mnyam pa gang las 'di khyim dbub pa gang yin pa de sems mod/ des smras pa/ sems

las chung ngur 'dug shig dang / 'di'i chung ma kho bos rigs mnyam pa las btsal lo// yul gang du/ des smras pa/ re zhig yul ma ga d+hAr 'gro'o// de bzhin du byos shig/ de rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin dang mtshungs pa gzhan zhig gnas pa de'i khyim du zhugs nas sgo khang du 'dug ste smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ khyim de'i skye bos smras pa/ bram ze ci zhig slong / bu mo slong ngo // su'i phyir/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de'i'o//

de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rigs ni mnyam na/ 'on kyang kho bo cag la gnyod mang du dgos so// mang khyad ji snyed/ gangs can ri'i glang po che brgya/ rta brgya/ gser gyi rgyan brgya/ dre'u'i shing rta brgya/ tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/ bram ze'i khye'u

sbrang rtsi'i phung pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la don de'i phyir yi ge spring ba dang / des kyang bklags nas thams cad sbyar gyis longs shig ces yi ge'i lan spring ngo // des nyin zhag dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dag bstun nas blangs pa dang / de nas des gtsang zhing

bsod pa'i kha zas mang pos tshim par byas nas bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi khyim du song ste gnas btab pa dang / 'khru bas thebs nas bram ze rnams dang ngo shes pa ma yin pas de rnams mi gtsang bas skrag pas phyir phyung ste bor ba dang stes te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis

phyogs der phyin pa de gnyis kyis de mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis kyis smyug ma'i tshal bas bzhar nas sa dkar pos bskus te bkrus nas de la chos bshad nas dong ngo // de 'khru ba 'chad du ma btub nas des de gnyis la sems dad pa skyed nas shi ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes

nas/ de rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i drung du song ste gnas bslangs pa dang des smras pa/ khyod song la de nyid du lho sgor gnas thob shig/ des der song ste gnyug mar gnas par gyur to// lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gangs can ri'i glang po che brgya skyes

su bskur ba dang / des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kho bo la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gangs can gyi ri'i glang po che brgya skyes su bskur gyis/ gal te dgongs par gyur na len pa thong shig ces spring ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na

ba der song ste phyin pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bdag rgyal po'i khab tu bgyi ba cung zad cig la der mchi ste slar mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs kyis song la de nas nga'i glang po che brgya zhig blang dgos pa de dag kyang ded de shog shig/

des smras pa/ lha gal te der bdag la 'tshal ba ma mchis na blangs la 'dir mchis nas lha'i thugs mnyes par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gnyod mang du khyer nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to//

de khyim bdag gang gi khyim du gnas btab pa'i khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te nang mi rnams la bsgo ba/ nang rje dag longs shig/ bzhin dag longs shig/ shing rnams gshegs shig/ me dag bus shig/ 'bras chan tshos shig/ tshod ma tshos shig/

bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig/ bkad sa'i zhal ta dag gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di bag ma len tam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ yul mi rnams 'dis zas la mgron du bos sam/ tshong pa'am/ tshogs

sam/ 'khor tam/ 'dis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po zas la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag ci khyod bag ma len tam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ yul mi rnams khyod kyis zas la mgron

du bos sam/ tshong pa'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor tam/ khyod kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po zas la spyan drangs sam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len pa'am/ bag ma gtong ba yang med/ kho bos yul mi yang zas la ma

bos/ tshong pa ma yin/ tshogs ma yin/ 'khor ma yin/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang zas la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya

ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pa dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ ba spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos

ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// khyim bdag dge

'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u

rigs dang / dmangs rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/ khyim bdag 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/ sang kho

bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da lta gang na bzhugs/ rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod kyi bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis bltar rung

ngam/ des 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / gal te 'di nyid du gshegs nas sang mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de'i nub mo sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas gnyid log ste/ de nam ma langs

par nam langs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe pho nya glo bur du 'ong ba dang 'gro ba rnams kyis mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo'i thun dang po dang tha ma gnyis la lho sgo phye ste 'jog go// ji tsam na lho sgo phye ba dang snang bas gsal bar gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du

sems te/ 'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi za bar nam langs so snyam du rig nas snang ba de nyid du grong khyer nas byung ba dang / de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas slar nam sros par gyur to// de yang 'jigs par gyur bag tsha bar gyur zhing spu zing zhes byed par gyur

nas bdag mi'am mi ma yin pa'am/ g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtses te gnyod mang po yang ma son par phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams te slar ldog par 'dod pas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi'i phung po'i 'dug gnas la bskor ba byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi phung po

'di snyam du sems te/ deng nyid du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bden pa mthong bar 'gyur na/ deng nyid 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spangs te lha gzhan la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/ gang yang lho sgo nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar

snang brgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/ slar ma ldog shig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya// dre'u'i

shing rta brgya dang ni// sna tshogs nor gyis sbyar ba yi// rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/ slar ma ldog shig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ gangs can ri yi glang chen brgya// gser dang nor bus brgyan byas la// lus che gshol mda'i mche bar ldan// ma tang gar skyes stobs po che// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/ slar ma ldog shig/

khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyis slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya// nor bu'i rna cha gdub kor thogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi// mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu

drug char yang mi phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/ slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin khyod su zhig/ khyim bdag

kho bo ni khyod kyi grogs po rnying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung po yin te/ kho bos dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te/ lho sgo 'di nyid na gnyug mar gnas so//

de'i phyir kho bo ni khyod nyid la 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/ slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no zhes smra'o// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bdun bcu lnga pa/ de nas khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la da ltar lha yang brtson par byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de blta bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur

khrod gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas

kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed de// bcom ldan 'das ji ga bde bar mnal tam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal

pa/ gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la// zag med rab tu rnam grol ba// mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni// thams cad du ni bde bar mnal// 'dir ni re ba kun bcang nas// thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal zhing // zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis ni// nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa

dang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam mdzad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams ni mnog chung ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges

par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /

skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam

rgyas par rab tu bstan to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs te/ dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog

med pa tshon du gzhug par 'os pa tshon gyi nang du bcug na legs par tshon rtsi 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam

mngon par rtogs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan

gyis mi bkri ba dang / chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun

pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag skyabs su mchi lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon

par dad lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa bdag gi ming ni bzang sbyin lags mod kyi/ mgon ma mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ma stsol bas des na bdag la skye bo

rnams kyis mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul phra tsi na zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams kyi grong rdal mnyan yod ces bgyi ba de na bdag mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang /

bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lags so// khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod

dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so// khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchi ba dang gzhan

du mchis pa dang / mchis par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas des rgyal po'i khab tu bsgrub pa dang / bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad byas te grub nas slar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong zhig stsal du gsol/ bdag de dang lhan cig mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

dgongs pa dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na/ dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA

ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang

lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te gnas mal ji ltar longs spyad pa mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na

ba der rgyu zhing song ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin pa dang / de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal nas nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos

tshal dang / 'chag sa nas 'chag sa na dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang /

rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs de gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go zhes pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring ha cang

yang mi nye la nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi

phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug

lag khang brtsig lags so// des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ma yin te/ skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi de nga'i yin no// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag la skyed

mos tshal stsol cig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba gshibs kyang mi gtang ngo // yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so//

gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig long shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so// sus rin bcad/ khyod kyis rin bcad mod/ de gnyis rin bcad do// ma bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas zhal che gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i

mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / de'i bar du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par rtsom gyis de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs

pa'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i mi'i drung du song nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod pa'i sna

chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nus kun dga'i ra ba rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig long shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no// de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis

shing rta dang / khur dang / sgye dang / gzeb dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad bye bas gshib par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go// de nas khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis

bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po yongs su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod gal te 'gyod pa skyes

na gser dang dbyig khyer cig/ kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no// gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'dir bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba

yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la da ltar khyim

bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po chen po yongs su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di kho bo la byin cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par

bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed lam bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par

brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas glongs pa'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig shig/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer

rnams bgos te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no// kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go// de rnams rgyal po'i

drung du dong ba dang / de yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi rdol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te nga'i shags

kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig/ des smras pa/ rung gis re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu kho na la brtag go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi

gzhug ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ci 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam

'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/ bdag kho na la rag las par mthong ngo // yang bsams pa/ ci 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba

yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo // dus ji srid cig na tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/ zhag bdun lon nas so snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes

te/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag shA ri'i bu na re rung gis de bzhin du bya'o// 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di la ni rgyu gnyis yod

par gyur te/ yang na ni de ni 'bros 'dod do// yang na ni de phyogs tshol 'dod do// de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams kyis phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang kun du rgyu mig dmar mthong nas

de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig/ dus ji tsam zhig na 'di nas

zhag bdun pa'i nyin bar ro// rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/ mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang sems khral skyes nas nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang nyi ma bgrang bar byed do// ji tsam na zhag bdun

lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyang 'dus so// mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i

tshogs dang de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes so// kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas rtsod pa'i

dkyil 'khor du zhugs te 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas dran pa sngon du btang ste/ spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug pa dang / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can

rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas khyod kyis shig shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'jig mi nus na kun du rgyu mig

dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams nas/ kun du rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis byos shig ngas bshig go// de mig 'phrul la byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char

drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des de kun du brnal nas ming gi lhag ma zhig bzhag

go// des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/ des de blangs so// des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa btab pa las nyes par spyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par

byed pas des de nyid la bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas 'phags pa skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags

kyi phur ba phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag

'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin pa dang des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas

nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so

so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe

dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du blta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin

shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so// de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas

kyi byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// 'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// mu stegs can

rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di bdag cag gis shags kyis tshar gcad par mi nus kyis/ thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du gla mi'i las byas la/ de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin gyi drung du song nas son pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas pas yul bor

na mi rung ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag par bya'o zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid

nas/ bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ji 'di rnams la dge

ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med ces bsams pa la zhugs na yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las snyam na/ bdag kho na la'o snyam nas des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla

mi'i las bya bar brtsams pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa las

de rnams kyis de mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/ de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong nas bskor te 'dug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams sems ci 'dra ba zhig gis bdag gi

drung du lhags snyam na/ ji tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong nas de lcag thogs te sbad nas des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bskyab tu gsol/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig

song la ngal sor chug cig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di bsad par bsams na/ 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams

kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du

zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i

bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal bar byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa

g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra

bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang / mngon

par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA

ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa

shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang ba dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa

de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang

phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA

ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa na shul tshad ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tshad tsam mo// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i

lam du 'gro'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang bdag rtsig tu bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis brgyan/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug/ dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go// de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang

rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/

bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid do zhes kyang stsol cig/

jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya

ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la zhes bya ba nas

bkur sti bgyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas

song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ dang ba 'khor dang ba/

khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / glang po che glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / bram

ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /

tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / yul 'khor

skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis

bskor ba lta bu dang / brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu dang / sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu dang / glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams

shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan zhing / dpe byad brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i

ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan

yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas

mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ kun du g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs

mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdung

zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas ni steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag 'thor

zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang gzhan yang ya mtshan 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to// mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to// glang po che

yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to// khang pa na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to// long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo// 'on pa rnams kyis rna bas thos so// lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to// dbang po ma

tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur to// chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byams pa thob par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa rnams

ni bcings pa las thar to// nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed de/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so// gshegs nas dge slong gi

dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin

yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gi las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med de/ 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas

sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyis/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug ste sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal

brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod pa mdzad pa na gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gis ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ dge slong

dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do// gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang rab tu

dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go// de bzhin du sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na

bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las phyogs 'di sngon nam

phul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla

na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di

rgyang grags drug gser dang dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul te/ de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// khyim bdag rgyal

gyi tsha bo zhig des bsten pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste des bsams pa/ gang gis na bdag gis 'di nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar

'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang / de la rten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bskur nas/ des de mchod rten la btags pa dang de'i mthus des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab

pa/ ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gser dang dbyig gshibs pas nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di gser dang dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu

gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas par gyur cig ces btab bo// dge slong dag

ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de tshun chad bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gcig pa la ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong

ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum nor bu gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor

can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal

pa sum bcu rtsa gcig pa de nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs

'di rgyang grags gnyis mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis

de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor

dge slong bzhi khri dang lhan cig phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'dir ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo//

dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub

pa na ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las

nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med

zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang phyogs

'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags phyed gser gyi nas bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag

chu stod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// dge slong dag da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde

bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa nga yang 'jig rten du byung nas nga 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na da ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rmon pa dor bcu drug gis rmos pa'i

khyon bye ba gshib pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos te nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang ther 'bum chen po phrag drug

phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe khyim bdag nor zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gser dang dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dbul bar 'gyur zhing de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab

tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag nor zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim

bdag nor zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas kun tu khyim bdag mgon med

zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong ngo // zhes grags so// de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu

sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring

po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod cig dang / kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan

gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba brtags la khyed la smra bar bya'o zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang /

'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing rjes bzhin 'brang ngo // ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la des de'i rgyab tu thal mo brgyab pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go// des smras

pa/ khyim bdag khyod ni mkhas pa yin zhing bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pa yin pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // des mu

stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang / mu stegs can kha ngom can rnams kyis kyang kun du smras pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag

rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun du sgra grags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang

ldan na gter mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par bla ba ma yin no// 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra ba dang / dbyig gi skad yod de/ des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po

na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bdun bcu drug pa/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/

las de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar

gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par

smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal

pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi

bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi gzhir nang mi dang lhan cig dong ngo // sangs rgyas

rnams byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri 'or der phyin nas de skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs zhig

na 'dug go// skyed mos tshal bsrung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/ dpon po phyogs 'di na rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs so// des thos nas de yid dga' bar gyur zhing dad pa skyes te/ gang gi skyed mos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa ni bdag skal ba can yin

no snyam mo// bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen dang / nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bkur sti chen por byas

nas bsregs te/ me de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po che dang bsres te blugs pa dang rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas des drung du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres nas

shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di

nyid yin te/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa dang / khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bor gyur pa na des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas

mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin te/ de lta bas

na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa dang 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// // bar sdom ni/ rgyal dang rgyas pa mchu dang ni// srid sbyin dang ni phur bu

dang // chu stod dang ni zas sbyin dang // phyi ma pa ni nor yin// dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni// gsum pa nor bu mu tig yin// ba dang nas dang gos dang ni// bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshib pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las

nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnams las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge

'dun gyi slad du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad brtsig go// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ rin gyis sa nyos la rtsigs shig/ 'phags pa rin ci/ ji tsam stsal lags/ dbyig 'di snyed do// 'phags pa re zhig 'di snyed kyi 'byor pa lta bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/ de lta mod kyi

gal te phyogs 'di thob na brtsig go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la rtogs la gal te byin na rtsigs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brtags pa dang des smras

pa/ gal te bdag la brten te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi phyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to// gang zag gi phyir bgyid na mi stsal to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ni brtsig par bya'o// gang zag gi phyir ni yon bdag la brtags te gal te byin na brtsig par bya'o// ma byin na brtsig par mi bya'o// glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na de rnams smos

'drin ji lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ba dang / gzhan dag la smos 'drin med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o// ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod ba

der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ ji tsam na ri 'or der dbyar gyi nang logs su 'jigs pa byung nas/ de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de nas dge slong rnams kyis lam gyis dub pa ngal sor bcug ste/

lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang logs yin no snyam nas ma bskos pa dang / glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan

pa dag khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig/ de rnams 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas bar dam bca' bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha la dbyar phyi mar

gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / ci tsam na 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis

bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bcas kyi gsum pa ni ma yin no// 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyang smos 'drin ji lta ba

bzhin du ngal sor gzhug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams las su bsko bar mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la rnyed pa byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no// dge slong rnams

kyis kha zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni sbyin gyi gos kyi rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang mang du brtsigs pa las mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong par

'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams med cing nal phrug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad bgo bar bya ste/ re res kyang so sor gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi ci ran pa thams cad la longs spyad par

bya ste/ la lar ni snga dro 'dug par bya'o// la lar ni nyi ma'i gung la'o// la lar ni phyi dro'o// la lar ni nub mo gnas par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par

bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o// gal te mi nus par gyur na ji tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dge

slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gis phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/ chu snod gzhag pa dang / 'dag chal dang / sman dang / so shing gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par

chung ngu na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya ste/ nye 'khor ni spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang / shing drung dang / khang stong dang / ri sul dang / brag phug dang / rtswa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang / nags

mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig/ phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe dge slong kha cig dgon pa par dam bcas nas dgon pa na gnas pa las/ de rnams de na

chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to// gtogs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas lung mnod pa dang / bklag pa dang / gdon pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams

kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /

dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas sgo bcad de lde mig blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag/ phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsal bar dge

slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o// nye khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas/ de ni de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni bdag nyid kyis khyer ro// ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa

dang des gtsug lag khang stong bar mthong nas des dris pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nye dga'i yin no// de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin no// de der gnas

te des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba gsar ba'i byug bas ma byugs so// de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo // dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang / gtsug lag khang de phyag

dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas der phyag dar byas nas phyag dar bor te/ phyags ma zin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyags ma lag na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyags ma de

mi bzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas pa lta ste/ des na phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do// des smras pa/ 'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas gnas so// ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so// des smras pa/

rnyed pa ni nye khyer la de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya'am zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa su 'khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba

rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/ des de yon bsngo ba thos te de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug

lag khang brtsig na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/ des smras pa/ rtsigs shig dang / legs par bsngo'o// ji tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig tu bcug nas des der ci yang ma bzhag go// de stong pa nyid du 'dug pa ji tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas

des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin mi snum pas so// khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa tshwa sgo can dgon dung la brtsigs pa la ga la snum

par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de la bsams nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do// des smras pa/ 'phags pa da ni bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen po bskon no// nye rnyed pa thob bo snyam nas gral rim gyis bab pa na rang gi skal ba blangs nas

de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go// ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa des gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/ des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug

lag khang yin mod kyi/ dge slong nye dga'i skal bar dbang ngo // de nye dga'i drung du song nas khyod kyi skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go// des smras pa/ de bzhin du byos shig/ de de na gnas pa na bsod snyoms pa de mkhas pa snyom las mi byed pa zhig yin pas des de nyi ma

re rer byug pa dang / phyag dar byas so// phyag dar byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i

rtsa ba sogs pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so// ji tsam

dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang / phyag dar byed pa mthong nas de dad pa skyes te/ des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bskon pa nye thos nas de rings pa rings par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kho bo'i skal

ba yin gyis/ ras yug chen po kho bo la byin cig/ bsod snyoms pas bsams pa/ chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang 'dis mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de dge

slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni de kho na'i yin no// dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no// 'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang bu dang

chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnams su dong ba dang ma byin par len pa rnams kyis

gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la dong bar bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang lde mig byas te brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ma'i dge slong bzhag la dong bar

bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/ des sgo phye zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam/ rims med ces brda bya'o// gal te rims

dang bcas so zhes zer na mi dbye'o// 'on te rims med ces smra na dbye bar bya'o// gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams

kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lo ma ltar mnyen ba ni khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang / gtsug lag

khang sder mos brud cing bshang ba dang gci bas ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi srel ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi srel bas nang par sngar langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang / gtsug lag khang

byul bar bya ste/ sder mos brud pa gang yin pa de snyoms par bya'o// bshang ba dang gcis pa yang phyag par bya'o// dge slong khyi srel bas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa

nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ji tsam na der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nye bsams pa/ bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis par bya ba'am/

bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam pa las/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / dge 'dun de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas des bsams pa/ bdag

gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na spogs med par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ci zhig bya zhes de slar rings pa rings pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal phyed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/ rgan

rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes te ma bskos pa dang nye smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig ces pa'i skabs

de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song ba zhig yin na de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o// gzhan gyi ni gar bab pa bzhin du'o// nye dga' lhag

par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ des dbyar 'das nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang / gcig nas kyang ma thob cig shos nas kyang ma thob nas/ gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la kha

zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o// gcig nas byin pa dang dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang

gnyis ka nas phyed phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o// dam 'cha' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no// cig shos ni grong mtha'

pa rnams kyi yin no// khyim bdag de'i kun du spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas de ras yug chen rnams khyer te dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / nye dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed

pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas des dga' bo la spring ba/ gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na skal ba nos shig ces smras nas/ de rings pa rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag

khang der song gis/ da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las re zhig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la phyis 'dir dbul lo snyam nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang khyim bdag des ras yug po che zhig byin no// yang bzed

pa dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod la ras yug po che phul lags na ci yang bzhed dam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dbyar gnas pas de'i skal ba nod do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag

nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo// de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// nye bsams pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsams nas/ grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa

bdag gi ras yug po che rnams mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so// khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras yug po che brims nas song ngo // nye yang slar dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na ji tsam ras yug po che rnams brims

zin pa dang / de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nye dga' lhag

par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge
