las brtsams te chos kyi gtam glengs na mu stegs can dang kun du rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge sbyong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lta bu ston pas bdag nyid la stod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi

rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka'

stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu nga rgyab bsnyung bas re zhig de bsal gyis/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra

bas khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas/ snam sbyar bltab ste sngas phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du

shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldang ba'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams

gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos

sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang

yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa mthong ngo // mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi

bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ gau ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing

ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur

zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// dper na 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa

dang / khebs pa de bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum

tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na mar sar lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// gau ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa de 'chags shing 'jig rten

chags na de na sems can kha cig tshe zad/ las zad/ bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams

shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla

ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/ zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba

med do// skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta

de ltar sred do// ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi

zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo // mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do// ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i

bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to// de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten

du mun pa byung na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

ro// de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi

tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no// khyod ni kha dog ngan pa can yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de

rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// gau ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal

bar gyur to// dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs

shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so// gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i

bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta

bu'o// de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la

brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams

sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag nub par gyur to// gau ta ma dgas zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar

byed do// dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du/ sems can de rnams sa zhag

de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa'i 'di'i don 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so// gau ta ma dag sems can de

rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta

bu'o// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi

tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis yin no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga

rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes

smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar gcad pas tshar gcad par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su bzlas shing 'di skad ces/ mdun nas

phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa'i 'di'i don ni

'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so// gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa sbun ma med pa shun pa med pa dag pa gtsang ma skyes

te/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar skyes pas brngas par yang mi mngon no// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas sems can de

dag rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyis dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur to// kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o// kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o// de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang

yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta'o// ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun du chags so// ji lta ji ltar kun du chags pa de lta de ltar zhen to//

ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can

ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kwa'i sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o// dper na da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na phye ma dang / dri dang /

phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong nas sas gtor zhing bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo

rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kwa'i sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod

do// gau ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod/ 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar

'dod do// de rnams kyis de zhag gcig spangs pa nas zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun du yang spangs so// gang nas sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas de rnams

khang pa rtsig pa la brtson par byed de/ 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do// 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po

yin no// de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no// de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do// nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par

sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do// de nas sems can snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sA lu nub mo blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong / de nas sems

can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni nang par gyi sA lu do nub blangs so// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la

bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam du sems nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad

ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong / de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu

blangs zin no// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so// gang

nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par

yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan

lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs

pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid dag

zhugs par gyur te/ kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to// bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha

dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog

ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog

phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang

du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can

la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to// sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro

phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/

zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon

pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skyes

te/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis

ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// brngas shing brngas pa yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs

sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la 'di ni khyed kyi'o// 'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing dgod de mtshams bcad mu thug bres so// gau ta

ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi gtso bo yin no// de nas sems can zhig gis

rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so// sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can des rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa'i sems can

khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'i sems can song la khyod phyin cad de ltar ma byed cig/ sems can des lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs so// sems can

des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par len pa mthong ngo // mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa'i sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir

blang zhes des de phar drangs tshur drangs nas/ ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/ shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du lan gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par len to zhes spyos so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis

sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa'i sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'i sems can song la khyod phyin cad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//

shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te/ ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas spyos so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa'i sems can khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs

tshur drangs nas/ ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas ci'i phyir spyo// kwa'i sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag sA lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur 'dren zhing ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du

spyo ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi

bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de la chos bzhin du thog shes sbyin

par bya'o snyam nas/ de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te de rnams kyi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te 'di skad

ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog/ kho bo cag la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas chod cig/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig/ kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du

thog shas sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la phan 'dogs par byed cing / de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/ skye bo'i tshogs

chen pos bkur cing mang pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so// zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so// chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul

khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang

pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog tshur shog ces bya bar gyur to// 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to// gau ta

ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to// dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i

rkang zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang

ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang /

de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zags nas re res nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed do//

de rnams bsams/ gzhal/ nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na/ de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med

pa yin no// // bar sdom la/ sems can tshur shog sme ba can// sprin mgrin dang ni de bzhin du// ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes// sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa yin// gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin

tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun du brgyan pa zhig byung

ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen

cig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa

gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// gau ta ma dag

rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/

mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi

dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//

de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu

de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// gau ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes so// 'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o// dge ba'i dge mchog go// dge mchog gi gso

sbyong 'phags so// gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o// nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o// mdzes pa'i nye mdzes so// nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang / mdzes ldan kyi nye mdzes ldan dang / bzang po dang / legs bzang dang / btang ba dang / btang bzung dang /

yan lag dang / yan lag shing rta dang / ngan spong dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / sha ku ni dang / sha ku ni chen po dang / ku sha dang / nye ba'i ku sha dang / ku sha chen po dang / legs mthong dang / legs

mthong chen po dang / rab thob dang / rab thob chen po dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang / 'od byed pa dang / rtul phod dang / lhun po ldan dang / lhun po yod dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer ldan dang / 'od zer yod dang /

kun nas 'od zer ro// gau ta ma dag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul

zhes bya bar gyur to// gau ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo // de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ ma rgyal

ba las rgyal bar byed pas na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po drug khri sum stong yul bA rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi

tha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim bi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta

ma dag rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po glang pos sbyin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang /

yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer

brang gis nyal du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshan po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po tshan po che 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/ de

rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ku n+ya ku ba dzar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung ngo //

gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po klu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang /

sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer ta ma lir byung ste/ de

rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta

ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha

dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad

khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni

rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta

ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang

tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong

grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad

de/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo // mu khyud las 'bying ba dang / sra ba'i mu khyud dang / rko ba dang / nye bar rko ba dang / rko ba yod pa dang / kun nas rko dang / gya nom snang dang / mnyam snang dang / thos pa'i sde dang / chos kyi

sde dang / rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa chen po dang / rtogs pa'i sde dang / mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral dang / brtan pa'i sde dang / dga' bas sbyar dang / glen gsal dang / skya reng dang / phyogs kyi bdag po dang / rngul can dang / bde byed dang /

kun dga' dang / me long gdong dang / skyed pa dang / kun nas skyed pa dang / skye bo'i khyu mchog dang / bza' btung can dang / bza' btung mang po can dang / mi thub pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / gnas pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang /

stobs chen dang / stobs chen zhon dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / brtan pa zhon dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu sra dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa

dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta sra ba'o// gau ta ma dag rgyal po shing rta sra ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun du snang bar byung ste/

de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po'i bu klu mnyam skyong ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu mnyam skyong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA

rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul

ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir sngon smon lam btab nas

tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu legs skyes so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung

ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ gau ta ma dang / ba ra dwa dza'o// de gnyis las gau ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o// ba ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o// des

pa chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus

la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma

mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin te/ nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu

'byung / des smras pa/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thog go// de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas rgyal pos gal gyis gcu bar shes nas gnang ngo // de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag

ces bya ba gnas so// de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab

tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung shig/ des de rab tu phyung ngo // drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas/ gzhon nu ba ra

dwa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gau ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po dgon pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ bu rung gis grong ngam dgon

pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/ khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bo byos la 'dug shig/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te

gnas so// de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro// des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas

pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' mgur spyod kyis tshur shog/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa

ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag la skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras so// mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de dang de dga' mgur spyad

nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo // des bsams pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bdag gis bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/ pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ skyed mos tshal gang

du mchi zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi jo mo skad cig la skabs med skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de de dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/ rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyis de khyod kyi

gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do// de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i

rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig/ des song nas bzang mo la smras pa dang / de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur

spyad par rigs sam/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do// de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad

do// jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so// de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun

du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de ral gri khrag can mthong nas rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes de nas drang srong gau ta ma de bskor te mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kwa'i rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan

thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do// des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes des zhi ba smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po

des lag pa phying ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so// rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs

kyis gsal shing la shon cig/ de nas rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams

su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no// de'i mkhan po mdog nag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des

phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon par mthong nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnad du

bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma phyung ba'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang mkhan po bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no// bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan

po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen

po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog gnag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun du drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to//

de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to// de nas drang srong gau ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang / skye ba ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re bu med pa rnams la 'gro ba med do// zhes zer na khyod

kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gis bu bskyed pa lta ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par

gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/ ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas des rdzu

'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char ba'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang rlung grang mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pas rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so// gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i

'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgong gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der

de gnyis zhugs so// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu gcig pa/ de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o// de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal

shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo // des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong

gau ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bsnyod de/ de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas

na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to// drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa gau ta ma gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes zhes bya bar gyur to//

bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dwa dza bu med par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag da su zhig

rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'os pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song

ste son pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag

dran par bya'o// ma nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di dang 'di'o// skyon med pa gnod pa mi

byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes

de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/

'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas pa rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shes rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang

bu med par shi'o// de nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin

du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo // gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no// dus gzhan

zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems

khong du chud cing mi 'dug/ lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ ci'i slad du rje'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod na nga la su zhig bu mo ster

bar 'gyur lha dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo// ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de de rnams kyis brtags te rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas de rnams kyis

gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba khug shig/ de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go// gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas

smras pa/ lha bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir

bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha la snyan du gdags par

gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin

no// lha don de la nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang dgyes dgur spyod par mdzod cig dang / de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ ci ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos

smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par

byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so//

btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bya

bar btags so// khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/

des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub mo dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring ba khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo der

'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go// rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga'

rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya

che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur la gzhon nu de rnams ni spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa

ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma bgyis pa yang spyug la/ skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni bzhag go// rgyal pos btang snyoms

su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor

byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang

ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo // blon po rnams skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags

so// de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'am gzhon nu

rnams rol pa 'di 'gal ba ci mchis de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po chas pa dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra

thos so// thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis

la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor

gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo

phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na sgo chod cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo

gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil po dag byas te gnas btab ste bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti

gnas su dong bar byed do// lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng

por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so// des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la/ mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta

bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo // de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar

byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser

skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so// drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na

bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan du mchi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag la phog shig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis

grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to// de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por

gyur te dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der song ste grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus

nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chog shes

par bya'o// de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa ni mi len to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran te blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag gzhon

nu de rnams da lta gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig las spyugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang

ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid do// de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod

par bgyid pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/ lha rngo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyang ste ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu

rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to//

de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur to// de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang bu med par shi nas lag rna rgyal por gyur

to// de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur te/ de'i bu gnas 'jog go// gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo// gau ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang

tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya

pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no// gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge'i 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o// gau ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni seng ge'i

'gram mchog tu grags so// gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre bo ma dang / tshad med ma'o// zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom

ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha sbyin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do// dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no// bre mo ma'i bu ni bzang len no// tshad med ma'i bu dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra can zin yin te/

gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur ba'i rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i breng rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor ba zad de/ da ni yang srid pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas/

bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu legs so// legs so// maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam

smras pa yang khyod legs so// maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon gyi shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/ zung shig/ lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams

pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so//

de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng

ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/

'bras dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde

ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs

pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor

mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum

tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes

te/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas

rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor

los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun

mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag

thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/

'on te las sna tshogs sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye

bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid

nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de

zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// yang de rtse

bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/

sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par

gzugs bzang bas de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/

de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsa' ba ni sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum

tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro

zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas gang la skyes bu chen

po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa re zhig 'dod do// cig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o// de'i tshe shAkya

rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams

dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so// lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa de sbyin pa lta na gtong ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar

bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams

bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsung shig dbul lo// shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so// lha ci khrims dral lam/

des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa cig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no// lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas kho bos tshogs la

brtags zin gyis/ bu mo cig shos kyang bkri shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/

'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang /

ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / lhan cig steng gi khang gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur

spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la

gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta

bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la

bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas/ smad

par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang

gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram

shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ yul dbus 'di ni bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / 'bras dang /

bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul 'tha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba

blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas

na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya

thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/

blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma

dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems

dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no// byang chub sems

dpa' rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur

zhing ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang

chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi

'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs

par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/

tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /

rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs

'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin

pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs pa lnga gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris

drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi rtogs par byas/ khyod cag las gang dag

bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba longs shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod

cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu'i gling rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so// de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze rgyus

rgyal dang / bram ze gnas rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur

dang / kun du rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di

snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyi bar sems lags so//

de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang byang

chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dag 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang

'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par byas te bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// mi rtag pa'i dung 'bud par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o// bdag

med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms// rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms// nyi ma gcig gis

mun pa du ma rnam par sel// grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das

'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis/ ma la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing

lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums

su zhugs so// smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes nas// lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te// nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar 'char ltar// de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums su zhugs// 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po

mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la 'dzeg pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o// des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam ston

mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug shig/ de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na sras
